update_description:
‚ú® New Features
- Redesigned Home Feed with improved layout and better content organization
- Added Country Selection to personalize the onboarding experience
- Long press on user profile to preview profile picture
- Added Account Switch option via long press on profile icon
- Share profiles and songs directly via external messaging apps

üîí Privacy Improvements
- Users can securely view profile pictures
- Screenshot capture is restricted during profile preview to protect user privacy

üé® UI / UX Improvements
- Improved visual hierarchy and spacing across the Home Feed
- Added premium Liquid Header design to Settings toolbar
- Refined Community playlist layout with direct play access
- UI/UX enhancements across all navigation screens
- Smoother navigation and interaction experience

‚ö° Performance & Optimization
- Optimized Home Feed loading and playback transitions
- Improved overall performance and responsiveness
- Enhanced content rendering and loading efficiency

üêû Bug Fixes
- Fixed Play button functionality for Community cards on Home screen
- Resolved issue where cached music downloads could get stuck
- Fixed missing metadata mapping during ExoPlayer background caching

üìå Overall
This update focuses on improving navigation, personalization, performance, and overall user experience.
